body: Omg guys it has been almost 2 years i cant believe i have been here for three years and you know what!? stop bragging about how you guys have wasted countless days in front of a screen getting arthritis and bad vision. wanna know what you could have been doing? :D Helping homeless people, becoming a popular student, finding a cure for AIDs, etc.. Well, happy anniversary kids! :)))
